name: PolySphere - Low Art
description:
PolySphere Low art is an amazing creative 3D artwork game that let you relax while you create amazing pieces of art.

Discover over 90 unique artworks by reassembling the artwork fragments.

How To Play?
- Select one of the template.
- Swipe to rotate the puzzle until you see a complete picture.
- Done!

Poly Sphere Low art is preferred for all ages. No skills required! Large and interesting poly art photo, What you waiting for!
